Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Seal impression
Description: Small print of seal of the fortress of Shalfak on the second cataract. It was affixed on to a papyrus with a seal of the scarab type, a testimony to the correspodance that was exchanged between the persons in charge of the Egyptian establishments in Nubia. The rolls of papyrus were fastened with a cord closed by a seal.
